Title: We all passed the test excellently
Publisher: Xinmeishu chubanshe (新美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: The poster hanging on the wall is very similar to Zhang Cizhong's "Youngsters energetically take part in youth football sports", published in 1953. The title on this poster-in-poster is 鍊好身体建設祖國 - "Forge" the body well to build the motherland.This is a print from the third impression (December 1954).
